title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Surface existing non-Microsoft DLP policies with the migration assistant
description: Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention migration assistant helps you transfer your non-Microsoft existing DLP policies to the Microsoft Purview DLP with minimal effort. This tool will automatically detect your policy configurations and create equivalent policies in the Microsoft Purview DLP environment. The v1 of the tool supports conversion of Symantec DLP policies only.
